Class CadmiumListener

java.lang.Object
  com.google.inject.servlet.GuiceServletContextListener
      com.meltmedia.cadmium.servlets.guice.CadmiumListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener
public class CadmiumListener
extends com.google.inject.servlet.GuiceServletContextListener

Builds the context with the Guice framework. To see how this works, go to: http://code.google.com/p/google-guice/wiki/ServletModule

Author:
Christian Trimble

configureLogback

public void configureLogback(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext,
                             java.io.File logDirFallback)
                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                             java.net.MalformedURLException,
                             java.io.IOException

Reconfigures the logging context.

The LoggerContext gets configured with "/WEB-INF/context-logback.xml". There is a logDir property set here which is expected to be the directory that the log file is written to.

The logDir property gets set on the LoggerContext with the following logic.

  • LOG_DIR_INIT_PARAM context parameter will be created and checked if it is writable.
  • The File object passed in is used as a fall-back if it can be created and written to.

Parameters:
servletContext - The current servlet context.
logDirFallback - The fall-back directory to log to.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if no logDir can be written to.
java.net.MalformedURLException
java.io.IOException
See Also:
LoggerContext}
